ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ فِى شِيَعِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We sent Messengers before you among the disparate groups of previous peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We had also sent apostles to people of earlier persuasions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Muhammad), certainly We did send Messengers before you among the nations which have gone by.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We sent Messengers to the ancient people who lived before you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We sent Noble Messengers before you, to the former nations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Indeed, We sent (Messengers) before you (O Muhammad) amongst the earlier communities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We sent (apostles) before you among the nations of yore.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Indeed, We sent Messengers before thee, among the factions of the ancients,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We verily sent (messengers) before thee among the factions of the men of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We sent messengers before you to the previous peoples,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We have sent apostles before thee among the sects of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We sent [apostles] before you to former communities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We did send messengers before thee amongst the religious sects of old:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Indeed, We sent Messengers before you (O Muhammad SAW) amongst the sects (communities) of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have sent forth before you Messengers among the factions of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We sent others before you, to the former communities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:10] And verily We sent before you, messengers, to former factions, sects.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We verily sent (messengers) before thee) Muhammad, (among the factions of the men of old) among the groups of old.
